page.title: Koha
page.t: Redesigned using the same combat-ready cockpit used by the new-look Eclipse, the Koha improves upon it by increasing the amounts of weaponry and shields it carries - effectively sacrificing all cargo space and most crewspace to be even more devastating against both small- and medium-sized ships.\n\nThis sacrifice does make the ship less versatile, but nonetheless both the Federal and Republic navy has found the new Koha to be a worthy addition to their fleets, with Argon ship designers once again leading the race to design ships effective for military use.
